Examples

<06FF07011501DC - seems to be something when power cycling controller, from aircon - maybe error message?

Start up...
>06AA0701000146
<06AA0701060140
>06BA06010038
<06BA2301064644584D3235463356314239000000000000001C003E950070650001003F -- includes FDXM25F3V1B9 which is unit model number
>06BB06010037
<06BB1A0106D28900002CD2117DB02000100020001000050C24F1

Normal polling, various responses...
Includes B7, BD, BE, CA, CB

>06B70601003B
<06B7070121B762

>06BD06010035
<06BD230106BE0A6F0B7A01BE0A400BBE0A0000050000000500000005001400045E00F5
<06BD230106B40A6F0B1801B40A400BB40A0000050000000500000005001400045E0075
<06BD230106EC0A6F0BD005EC0A800BEC0A0000050000000500000005001500045E00D0
<06BD230106EC0A6F0BDC05EC0A800BEC0A0000050000000500000005001500045E00C4
<06BD230106EC0A6F0BE605EC0A800BEC0A0000050000000500000005001500045E00BA

>06BE06010034
<06BE0F0106010243040101000001D8 On
<06BE0F010600000000010100000122 Off
<06BE0F0106010272010101000001AC On

Commands?

Idle/polling
>06CA170100000000000000000000000000000000000017
<06CA1701060102021600001100000000000000000200E3
>06CB080100000025
<06CB08010602110C

Switch off
>06CA17010002120016800000000000000000000000006D
<06CA1701060102021600001100000000000000000200E3
>06CB080100029093
<06CB08010602110C

Switch on
>06CA17010003120016800000000000000000000000006C
<06CA1701060102021600001100000000000000000200E3
>06CB080100029093
<06CB08010602110C

Switch to cooling
>06CA17010003120016800000000000000000000000006C
<06CA1701060102021600001100000000000000000200E3
>06CB080100029093
>06CB08010602110C

>06CA17010003130016800000000000000000000000006B
<06CA1701060102021600001100000000000000000200E3
>06CB08010006908F
<06CB08010602110C

>06CA17010003110016800000000000000000000000006D
<06CA1701060102021600001100000000000000000200E3

>06CA1701000317000000000000000000000000000000FD
>06CA1701060101011600001100000000000000000200E5

<06CB08010601110D

>06CA170100031000000000000000000000000000000004
